item.name: Array Data Reduction
item.description: The data reduction ratio of the array volume. It includes deduplication, compression, and copy reduction.

item.name: Array Input Per Second
item.description: Number of bytes written per second.

item.name: Array Output Per Second
item.description: Number of bytes read per second.

item.name: Array Queue Depth
item.description: Average number of queued I/O requests.

item.name: Array Read Per Second
item.description: Number of read requests processed per second.

item.name: Array SAN Microseconds Per Read
item.description: Average time, measured in microseconds, required to transfer data from the array to the initiator.

item.name: Array SAN Microseconds Per Write
item.description: Average time, measured in microseconds, required to transfer data from the initiator to the array.

item.name: Array Shared Space
item.description: Total shared (Deduplicated data) space of the array

item.name: Array Total Data Reduction
item.description: The ratio of the total data reduced on the array volume. It includes data reduction, thin provisioning, zero detection, and unmap.

item.name: Array Microseconds Per Read
item.description: Average time, measured in microseconds, it takes the array to process an I/O read request.

item.name: Array Microseconds Per Write
item.description: Average time, measured in microseconds, it takes the array to process an I/O write request.

item.name: Array Used Space
item.description: Total used space of the array

item.name: Array Volumes Size
item.description: Total used space on all volumes of the array

item.name: Array Write Per Second
item.description: Number of write requests processed per second.

item_prototype.name: {#HOSTNAME} SAN Microseconds Per Read
item_prototype.description: Average time, measured in microseconds, required to transfer data from the array to the initiator.

item_prototype.name: {#HOSTNAME} SAN Microseconds Per Write
item_prototype.description: Average time, measured in microseconds, required to transfer data from the initiator to the array.

item_prototype.name: {#HOSTNAME} Microseconds Per Write
item_prototype.description: Average time, measured in microseconds, it takes the array to process an I/O write request.

item_prototype.name: {#VOLUMENAME} Input Per Second
item_prototype.description: Number of bytes written per second

item_prototype.name: {#VOLUMENAME} Output Per Second
item_prototype.description: Number of bytes read per second.

item_prototype.name: {#VOLUMENAME} SAN Microseconds Per Read
item_prototype.description: Average time, measured in microseconds, required to transfer data from the array to the initiator.

item_prototype.name: {#VOLUMENAME} SAN Microseconds Per Write
item_prototype.description: Average time, measured in microseconds, required to transfer data from the initiator to the array.

item_prototype.name: {#VOLUMENAME} Microseconds Per Read
item_prototype.description: Average time, measured in microseconds, it takes the array to process an I/O read request.

item_prototype.name: {#VOLUMENAME} Microseconds Per Write
item_prototype.description: Average time, measured in microseconds, it takes the array to process an I/O write request.
